<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
</head>
<body>
    <canvas id="canvas" width="300" height="300">
....</canvas>

    <script src="img/fabric.js">
....</script>

    <script>
        var canvas = new fabric.Canvas('canvas');
        var rect = new fabric.Rect({
            top : 100,
            left : 100,
            width : 60,
            height : 70,
            fill : 'red'
        });
        canvas.add(rect);
    </script>
</body>
</html>
